verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: ratcheted] up [ARG1: his attacks] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [C-ARG1: on Democrats opposing his immigration agenda] [ARGM-TMP: as they continued to pummel him as cruel and inhumane for splitting families up at the border] .
